textBeforeTable: College Basketball Home Court Winning Streaks Stats courtesy of ncaa.org. Note – Villanova has won 45 straight at The Pavilion, which is on campus. The Wildcats were defeated twice last season at Wells Fargo Arena – their other “home court”.  Here is a list of the longest home court winning streaks in college basketball. This past weekend, Kansas had its 69-game streak at Phog Allen snapped by Texas. Morehead State lost to rival Eastern Kentucky, which halted a 24-game run for the Eagles. Seven teams this season have had home winning streaks of 20 or more end. Pittsburgh looks for its 21st straight victory tonight as it plays host to Notre Dame. This coming Sunday, Northern Iowa travels to Missouri State in search of revenge. The Bears ended NIU's 21-game streak back in late December but the Panthers can return the favor as MSU's total is currently up to 19. Below is a list of the current win streaks and those that were busted. View Original Blog 01.24.2011     09:24 AM     CBB Handicapping: Longest home court winning streaks "I think every coach in
